CB Tests

_config.yml

Currently using iddings.csv metadata file.

The page_gen data value is correctly configured to use iddings.

Objectid

All items have objectid.

All objectid are unique.

CONTENTdm

Currently using spec_ji CONTENTdm collection (database link).

All items have cdmid.

All cdmid are unique.

Format

All items have format.

The following format values are used in the collection:

  • image/jpg, may not be supported.

For items in CONTENTdm, format values starting in image/, video/, or audio/ are likely to work. However, only image/jpeg; application/pdf; video/mp4; audio/mp3 are tested to display and download correctly. See CB docs for details.

John Edward Iddings' Lantern Slide Collection

Edward John Iddings was the Dean of the College of Agriculture at UI from 1915 to 1946. These slides depict agricultural and university-related scenes from Idaho, as well as images from Iddings' travels.
